org.lasarobotics.vision.opmode.extensions

Class ImageRotationExtension

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lasarobotics.vision.opmode.extensions.ImageRotationExtension
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VisionExtension

    public class ImageRotationExtension
extends java.lang.Object
implements VisionExtension
    Implements image rotation correction to ensure the camera is facing the correct direction

      • setRotationInversion

        public void setRotationInversion(boolean inverted)
        Set whether the direction of rotation should be inverted. This may be necessary when using the inner camera
        Parameters:
        inverted - True to rotate counterclockwise, false for clockwise
